nodes.bodyText:
change
the default value is true and no longer configurable.
to
the default value is true and is no longer configurable.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -64,7 +64,7 @@ decodeUrlPlusSign.name=Decode url plus sign
 decodeUrlPlusSign.desc=Decode the plus sign when it is part of the URL. The equivalent custom property in the full application server profile is com.ibm.ws.webcontainer.decodeurlplussign. For servlet-5.0 and newer Servlet features, the default value is false.
 
 suppressHtmlRecursiveErrorOutput.name=Suppress recursive exception in the HTML response
-suppressHtmlRecursiveErrorOutput.desc=Suppresses the exception information from appearing in the HTML output when there is a recursive error that cannot be handled by an application's configured error page. The equivalent custom property in the full application server profile is com.ibm.ws.webcontainer.suppressHtmlRecursiveErrorOutput.
+suppressHtmlRecursiveErrorOutput.desc=Suppresses the exception information from appearing in the HTML output when there is a recursive error that cannot be handled by an application's configured error page. The equivalent custom property in the full application server profile is com.ibm.ws.webcontainer.suppressHtmlRecursiveErrorOutput. For servlet-5.0 and newer Servlet features, the default value is true and no longer configurable.

nodes.bodyText: Also, it is no longer configurable via the property.
Where did this JSP come from? Copyright? Seems to have more than necessary for the test at  first glance.
copyright? Where did this come from? Is this from an existing app?
Should we just remove this from the metatype if we can't actually configure it?

+            required="false" type="Boolean" />

nodes.bodyText:
from Phil,
Simply remove it from the English, the build should notice the changed English file and package it up for me, I will then send it to translations in the next shipment (due late December) and the translation team will remove the message from the translated files.
Philip Nickoll
(i.e just merge PR without any further action.)

nodes.bodyText:
Should we also comment out this line?
public static boolean SUPPRESS_HTML_RECURSIVE_ERROR_OUTPUT;
This probably will also require a bundle version update I believe with feature checker since we're removing a public variable.
Thoughts?
I think we can just leave it there for the future record.
It's a public variable and this is exposed as an SPI so I think we should at the very least comment it out.
